trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_SEQ_00<tab>Cassard stands at the entrance to Mord Souq, an eager smile on his face.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ghen Gen.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Rhon Ron, and browse the available wares.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Ghen Gen.

TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_000<tab>Mord Souq... Not just full of Mord, but Humes and all manner of others, too! It has long been a refuge for folk displaced by the Flood, so the population is nothing if not diverse.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_001<tab>Oh, have you met a Mord before? They might look like shifty little blighters, but a more welcoming lot you could never wish to meet!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_002<tab>Speaking of which, we should pay our respects to Master Ghen Gen. I'll go ahead and let him know we've arrived.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_005<tab>Go on! Introduce yourself to Master Ghen Gen!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_010<tab>A full Voeburtite honor seems a bit rich for buying a dented pan or a bowl of worms. Did the Exarch lose to you at cards or something!?
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_015<tab>Rhon Ron's shop is best for eating! Crack your coinpurse and gorge on the delicious delicacies!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_020<tab>Welcome to Rhon Ron's, traveler! I have wares to empty your purse and fill your belly!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_021<tab>Take your time! Stare and sniff before you choose! But no drooling on the merchandise, yes?

TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_SYTEM_000_022<tab>Browse Rhon Ron's wares. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target a foodstuff and inspect it with <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var><var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 10 /var> / <var 1E 09 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_040<tab>They all look tasty, yes? Which to choose, which to choose!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_Q1_000_000<tab>Which to choose?
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_A1_000_001<tab>Mushloaf.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_A1_000_002<tab>Everburning Bounty.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_A1_000_003<tab>Chewy Skewer.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_A1_000_004<tab>Glazed Wriggler.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_041<tab>Ah, very wise! You won't wither on the sands with a gut full of cactus fruit filling!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_042<tab>You have the gold...?
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_043<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you forty loaves of bread!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_044<tab>Yes, put some spice in your step! You won't feel the cold this night...and probably not the next one either!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_045<tab>You have the gold...?
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_046<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you ten sides of lizard meat!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_047<tab>Mmm, chewy! A quick, easy meal to carry you across the desert!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_048<tab>You have the gold...?
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_049<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you sixty-five skewers!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_050<tab>Too good to resist, eh? (That's what I would've chosen!)
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_051<tab>You have the gold...?
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_052<tab>...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you fifteen jars!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_Q2_000_000<tab>Will you eat the lot?
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_A2_000_001<tab>Every last mouthful!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_A2_000_002<tab>I think I'll...sh-share...the rest...
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_053<tab>What an appetite! What a belly! A new legend is born in Mord Souq!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_054<tab>Our visitor invites us to feast! Let us give thanks for <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> great generosity─and small appetite!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_055<tab>Consider your coinpurse cracked! I am pleased to accept your custom, and Ghen Gen will be pleased that you honored ours!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_056<tab>...Keeping the merchandise down, yes? No returns!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_RHONRON_000_060<tab>I am honored to have been chosen! Go to Ghen Gen! Let him know that your coinpurse has been most decidedly cracked.
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_CASSARD_000_065<tab>I've never seen anyone eat so much of Rhon Ron's “cuisine” in one sitting... You've a stronger stomach than I!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_070<tab>I was watching from here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You honored our custom, and with great relish!
TEXT_LUCKMA302_03292_GHENGEN_000_071<tab>You will always be welcome in Mord Souq─if you need anything in Amh Araeng, we are here to provide!
